data.name: Moon Ball
data.summary: 4× effectiveness on familes of Pokémon with a Moon Stone evolution. Made from Ylw Apricorn.
data.description:
Used by trainer in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

    If the wild Pokémon is a []{pokemon:clefairy}, []{pokemon:nidoran-m}, []{pokemon:nidoran-f}, []{pokemon:jigglypuff}, []{pokemon:skitty}, or any evolution thereof, the wild Pokémon has 4× its catch rate.
